LogicBoard - Class in com.example.batallanaval.model
LogicBoard represents the main logic structure of the game board.
LogicBoard() - Constructor for class com.example.batallanaval.model.LogicBoard
Constructs a LogicBoard with a 10x10 board and initializes the fleet: 1 Aircraft Carrier, 2 Submarines, 3 Destroyers, and 4 Frigates.
LogicBoard.DrawBoard - Class in com.example.batallanaval.model
DrawBoard is a helper inner class responsible for visualizing the current state of the board in a GridPane using JavaFX.
